project.name: |-- 002-completable-futures
project.description:
Keywords: + Future + CompletableFuture
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates the use of Futures (introduced by Java 5) and CompletableFutures to perform async programming.
BestPriceFinderRunner: Illustrates how to work with async code using Futures and CompletableFutures from both the client and provider POV. Error management and the supplyAsync factory method is also illustrated.
